item.title: Terraform Cycle
item.description: Terraform Cycle error Using Seth Vargo's project for running vault-on-gke, I ran into the Terraform Cycle error when pulling in the latest changes from his repo (which we had forked). Both Terraform and I were happy with the plan, so I decided to go ahead with the apply. That's when I saw this: That's not particularly clear, so I decided to run terraform graph -draw-cycles -type=apply. This proved to be useless, because it didn't highlight any cycles at all.
